name: Precinct - from the creators of "Police Quest" (Canceled)
blurb: Precinct is a new police adventure video game from Jim Walls, creator of the classic Sierra series \u201cPolice Quest\u201d.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!  If you can participate at this level, you will get a thank you on our website.
You receive a 5-pack of HD wallpapers created by the game team as well as a thank you on our website.

Limited edition pre-order tier!  With this limited edition tier you will receive copy of the game when it's finished for PC or Mac.  It's a great way to support the project AND get a copy of the game!
Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a digital game soundtrack in MP3 format.  It's the perfect way to hear the songs the way they were meant to be heard!

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a digital copy of Precinct with exclusive "VIP Backer Status". As a VIP Backer, you will be sent a unique passkey which grants you access to all "VIP Backer Only" areas of www.precinctgame.com. VIP Backers also enjoy exclusive content in the final release of Precinct.

"VIP Backer Only" Website Areas Include:
- Sneak peeks of the game (screenshots and video clips)
- Private VIP Backer Message Board
- Exclusive webcasts and chats with Jim and his team during development
- Help develop Precinct by voting on critical design and production decisions.

Exclusive Bonus Content Includes:
- Vintage Police Cruiser
- Additional Weapons
- Police Computer Upgrade
- Special Undercover Mission

This tier is meant to replace the following $30 tier and all $30 tier backers (and above) will receive everything in this $29 tier.  We apologize for any confusion but the the $30 tier cannot be removed because it has been backed. We hope you enjoy the added value!
Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a digital copy of the game when completed.
Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a digital pack of final artwork from the game.
Including all previous rewards, your name will also appear in the 'Special Thanks' section of the game credits.

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive exclusive VIP access to the beta version of the game.  You will see the game progress being made, bugs and all!  By this time the game will be mostly done, although there may be some glitches.  But it still will be super-fun to play!
Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a digital pack of concept art.  You will see the vision and inspiration of what it took to make the in-game art.

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a physical piece of artwork from the game, signed by the artist and shipped to you.  Suitable for framing.  This piece of artwork has been created exclusively for Kickstarter backers.

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive an exclusive Precinct t-shirt.  As a backer on the project we are looking for YOUR ideas for the t-shirt.  For your design to be considered, please see the main page for guidance.

Including all previous rewards, Jim will record a custom answering machine/voice mail message for you.  You get to write the script (up to 30 seconds long), and as long as it's tasteful Jim will record it and send you an MP3.

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive an official Fraser Canyon PD police whistle with logo.  This is an awesome whistle and will prove to be a collector's item.  This whistle comes in it's own presentation box.
Including all previous rewards, you will also be listed as a tester in the game credits.  This is a great way for your name to 'appear in lights!'

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a Fraser Canyon PD Special Operating Procedures Manual.  This is a hard copy book detailing the Special Operations in Precinct.  It's a terrific collector's item!
Including all previous rewards, you will also receive a beautiful Precinct movie poster (27" X 41").  This poster will be a rare item and is suitable for framing.

Including all previous rewards, Jim will also sign your collectibles.  Send Jim anything you want (please keep it tasteful) and he will sign it and send back to you.  This is a great way to get your original shrink-wrapped copy of Police Quest signed, for example.\r\n\r\nIf you want Jim to sign anything super-heavy, we may need to charge additional shipping.

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive an Official Fraser Canyon Police Badge.  This is a high-quality police badge made  by the same company who makes badges for police departments across the entire US.

Including all previous rewards, you will also receive concept artwork signed by Jim Walls and the artist and shipped to you.  We will number each piece of artwork for each backer, so your piece will be completely unique.

Get in the trenches of game production.  Including all previous rewards, you will also receive an exclusive Alpha version of the game and a digital copy of the game postmortem.

At the end of every project there is a postmortem meeting where we talk about what went right with the project, what went wrong with the project and how we can improve next time.  

By receiving the Alpha version of the game and a copy of the postmortem, you will be exposed to the project like no one else.

In the game we are creating a "Founder's Room" where your photograph will appear!  Including all previous rewards, everybody will see your picture as they play the game and will know your contribution to the project.
Including all previous rewards, we will also name a street in the game after you.  As you're driving around the city you will see your name on the street signs.

Including all previous rewards, we will also name a significant location in the game after you.  Examples of locations are:  subway station, baseball stadium, freeway, etc.  We will make sure it is featured prominently in the product.

Including all previous rewards, you also get a one-hour personal Skype session with Jim Walls, Robert Lindsley and the Development Team.  Ask any questions you want!  We'll be happy to share our experiences (or war stories as the case may be) with you.  Each donor at this level will receive their own Skype session.

Including all previous rewards, you will also be listed as a Producer in the game and your name will be in the opening credits of the game.  This is a great way to support the project and be listed in the opening credits of an awesome game.  \r\n\r\nPlease note we can only have one in-game credit per person (so you won't be listed as a Producer and Tester).

Including all previous rewards, your name will also be used as a character in the game!  We will give you a few options of which character you'd like to be, and from those you can choose which character will have your name!

Including all previous rewards, you will also meet with Jim and the Precinct development team in Los Angeles, CA!  While at the game studio, you will participate in a design meeting and have lunch with Jim and the development leads.  We will work with you on the specific timing for travel.  Travel costs are not included.

Including all previous rewards, your face will also be used on the character named after you in the game!  We will give you a few options of which character you'd like to be, and from those you can choose which character will have your name AND face!

Including all previous rewards, you will also be listed as an Executive Producer in the opening credits of the game.  This is one of the first names people will see when they play the game.\r\n\r\nThis tier includes all previous rewards as well.  Please note we can only have one in-game credit per person (so you won't be listed as a Executive Producer, Producer and Tester).

Including all previous rewards, you will also be flown round trip to Coarsegold (domestic airfare included) to meet Jim Walls and Robert Lindsley.  You will be picked up in a limo at the airport and provided a hotel room for two nights.  Jim and Robert will give you a tour of Oakhurst, lunch on Bass Lake and a four hour boat ride.  We will work with participants on a date that works for everybody when the weather is nice.\r\n\r\nPlease note that International airfare is not covered.  However, if you are international, we would still love to see you!
